class.name: wxChoice
class.description:
A choice item is used to select one of a list of strings.

Unlike a wxListBox, only the selection is visible until the user pulls down the menu of choices.

int.name: selection
int.label: Selection
int.description: Index of the initially selected item or -1 for no selection (default: -1).

arraystring.name: content
arraystring.label: Content
arraystring.description: Content of the control; this property has any number of <item> XML elements as its children, with the items text as their text values (default: empty).

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_CHOICE_SELECTED
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_CHOICE_SELECTED event, when an item on the list is selected.
